name: replicate
signature: { (n: number): <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, R>[]; <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>, n: number): Effect<A, E, R>[]; }
description:
Replicates the given effect `n` times.
*Details This function takes an effect and replicates it a specified number of times
(`n`). The result is an array of `n` effects, each of which is identical to
the original effect.
*Example
